law.catch_line: Special permit for incorporated nonprofit wildlife conservation organization.
law.text: In addition to the game permits issued under KRS 150.175, the commission may issue a special permit to an incorporated nonprofit wildlife conservation organization. The commission shall promulgate administrative regulations governing the number of special permits to be issued per year per species for which a game permit is required. An organization that receives a special permit issued under this section may sell and transfer the permit if all proceeds of the sale are used in Kentucky for wildlife management.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 2, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 127, sec. 3, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 2, effective July 13, 2004. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 35, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000.
